content: ***meet loom buddies - weavers best friends but they will happily befriend a knitter or crocheter like you too *** for all of you weavers but not only weavers anybody who hoards all those yarn scraps…too short to knit with them too long to make a pom-pom…and in the end just what do you do with them that is least time consuming and yet cute and effective puzzled what to do with your loom waste well be puzzled no more these fun little buddies are not only quick to make can reduce your scrap stash but also can be a wonderful little addition to your finished woven gift pattern includes instructions for the making of the little hat ** flat & in the round ** and a guide for the buddy assembly enjoy magdalaine ♡ dolly delights *pattern support dolly delights /groups/dolly-delights group* ------------------- cork knits & other freebies bundle 1 - check it out for more freebies enjoy 1 https //www ravelry com/bundles/cork-knits--other-freebies
